review_text:
Opening an account with Bank Sohar has never been easier! Their mobile application allows you to open an account effortlessly, without the need to visit a branch. The process is quick, user-friendly, and requires minimal documentation.

One of the best features is the doorstep delivery of debit/credit cards, saving time and adding convenience. Additionally, online shopping is smooth and fast, with secure transactions and seamless payment processing, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

With its innovative digital services, excellent customer support, and commitment to convenience, Bank Sohar is a top choice for modern banking. Highly recommended!
label: app_store
